Detailed Description

template<class T, template< class ... > class C>
class oos::basic_has_many< T, C >

Base class for has many relationship classes.

This class acts as a base class for all relationship classes. It provides all common functionality for these classes.

Template Parameters
TThe type of the contained objects
CThe underlying container class
